野火期间长期护理机构的室内空气质量如何？比你想象的还要糟糕。每年，美国西部和加拿大的野火都会向天空喷出滚滚浓烟。当烟雾吹进爱达荷州西南部的宝藏谷时，博伊西地区的居民笼罩在肮脏的空气中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Whate28099s-indoor-air-quality-like-in-long-term-care-facilities-during-wildfires-Worse-than-youe28099d-think.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Whate28099s-indoor-air-quality-like-in-long-term-care-facilities-during-wildfires-Worse-than-youe28099d-think.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2603db00-2630-4937-a380-808032b3cd2a Tue, 23 Jan 2024 05:47:49 -0500 What’s indoor air quality like in long-term care facilities during wildfires? Worse than you’d think.

从肠道到大脑：饮食如何影响阿尔茨海默氏症和帕金森氏症的结果饮食调整和肠道微生物群的改变可能会影响阿尔茨海默病和帕金森病的病程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/From-gut-to-brain-How-diet-can-influence-Alzheimers-and-Parkinsons-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/From-gut-to-brain-How-diet-can-influence-Alzheimers-and-Parkinsons-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dad42d9-5f7a-4fef-9234-1805800043cd Tue, 23 Jan 2024 04:49:00 -0500 From gut to brain: How diet can influence Alzheimer's and Parkinson's outcomes

研究发现患有炎症性关节病的男性生育能力并未下降《风湿病年鉴》在线发表的研究表明，患有类风湿性关节炎等炎症性关节疾病的男性比健康同龄人更不可能不生育，而且生育的孩子更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-finds-no-fertility-decline-in-men-with-炎症-joint-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-finds-no-fertility-decline-in-men-with-炎症-joint-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5b1d40b-7246-48e1-bee4-53edde83201f Mon, 22 Jan 2024 22:27:33 -0500 Study finds no fertility decline in men with inflammatory joint disease
研究确定了影响早产治疗反应的遗传变异加州大学旧金山分校领导的一项研究首次发现了基因变异，可以预测患者是否会对早产治疗产生反应，早产是一种影响美国出生婴儿的十分之一的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-identizes-genic-variants-that-influence-response-to-preterm-birth-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-identizes-genic-variants-that-influence-response-to-preterm-birth-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72b6fea6-3025-4518-ace1-6483e83c6766 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 22:02:55 -0500 Study identifies genetic variants that influence response to preterm birth treatment
